desc: 全てのユニットの攻撃力・防御力・回復力・最大ＨＰを２５％アップ＆被ダメージ時、確率でＢＢゲージを少し増加＆通常攻撃時、確率でＢＢゲージを増加

dictionary.lore: The mantle that sealed the Mystical Wolf's proud, royal soul, it's said to hold part of the Wolf's immense power. It heightens all the senses in those who wear it. Also, in addition to imbuing its wearer with an unyielding will to fight, it imparts the ability to respond calmly and rationally in any situation. An individual wearing this cape is able to continue fighting undaunted no matter the circumstances.

name: 天狼套ゼフィーロ
